articles.title: An mRNA-based rabies vaccine induces strong protective immune responses in mice and dogs - Virology Journal - Virology Journal
articles.description: Rabies is a lethal zoonotic disease that is mainly caused by the rabies virus (RABV). Although effective vaccines have long existed, current vaccines take both time and cost to produce. Messenger RNA (mRNA) technology is an emergent vaccine platform that supp…
